formattedAddress: 226 W 26th St 9th floor, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 226 W 26th St 9th floor, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text:
I just completed Teaching House’s Cambridge CELTA (online) month intensive course. I heard about CELTA from a couple that I met in Spain four years ago. I remembered them highly recommending it and now I absolutely do too!
It was invaluable to have many opportunities to teach live, with preparation guidance and immediate peer and tutor feedback. Teaching House has a strong student-centered philosophy, where your growth is prioritized while you gain excellent methods to be a future student-centered teacher. During the course Teaching House provides even more resources than you can take advantage of, and they are available after you graduate as well. I am excited to continue my education and study, but the program is a foundation that I will reference for life. (Fringe benefit – a very nice community, and the knowledge that you can do most anything you put your mind to!)

originalText.text: The instructors at Teaching House are really professional and supportive of your career goals. I had a great experience here as a student and felt well-prepared to teach after graduating with my CELTA. When I asked for feedback on my resume three months after graduation, I got input right away and the advice is extremely useful. I'm glad I chose Teaching House!

originalText.text:
Studied with TH at the beginning of 2021, taking their online intensive CELTA curriculum. Despite just getting their feet under them with regard to remote teaching in the midst of the pandemic (with all the technical issues that that implies) I found the teachers and the content helpful and engaging.

It was occasionally difficult to find needed resources as online integration of TH content with Cambridge resources was not yet optimized but the teachers and staff were instrumental and efficient in guiding students to what they needed.

The course, itself, covered a great deal of ground and provided no small measure of practical experience in a very short period. Prospective students should expect to give just about everything they've got to the process if they choose the intensive path--the skills and contacts gained will be worth what you put into it.

TH also provides particularly valuable job-hunting information and resources that remain available after the course has ended. This includes job boards, connections with EFL teaching organizations like English First, and guidance and feedback in creating and fine-tuning your resume.

All-in-all, a rich and valuable experience.

originalText.text: I had an excellent experience completing my CELTA part-time online course here. The trainers, students, and other teachers-in-training were wonderful!

text.text: I had an excellent experience completing my CELTA part-time online course here. The trainers, students, and other teachers-in-training were wonderful!

originalText.text: CELTA training at Teaching House NYC was one of the best training experiences I've ever had as a teacher. I did the one-month intensive course and left wishing I'd done it before my prior years as an EFL teacher. Very structured, rigorous classes with excellent instructors who helped me even after the course ended. Highly recommend!
